data.title: Cannabis Control Appeals Panel Announces Teleconference Call Meeting
data.excerpt: The Cannabis Control Appeals Panel (CCAP) will conduct a panel meeting via teleconference on Monday, April 29th at 1:30 p.m.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
